info.title: Venus Protocol API
info.summary: API to support the Venus Protocol with data indexed from on chain activity

get.description: Query and paginate transactions.

200.description: Returns paginated queried transactions.

get.description: Query and paginate transactions.

200.description: Returns paginated queried transactions.

get.description: Returns paginated array of proposals. It takes an optional array of proposal ids to filter by.

200.description: Returns an array of proposals.

get.description: Returns details for a single proposal.

200.description: Returns a detailed proposal.

get.description: Get voter details for a given proposal.

200.description: Pagination object with paginated voter activity and a summary of proposal votes.

get.description: Get vote summary for a given proposal, includes sums of for, against, abstain and total votes.
Query voter accounts ordered by vote weight.

200.description: Returns an array of voter accounts ordered by vote weight

get.description: Retrieve a summary of an account's voter profile.

200.description: A summary of an account's voter profile including latest XVS transfers and governance transactions.

get.description: Retrieve a summary of an account's voter profile.

200.description: A summary of an account's voter profile including latest governance transactions.

parameters.description: Proposal model properties to use when ordering proposals

get.description: Returns an array of voter activity for a specified account.

200.description: Paginated response of an account's voter history.

get.description: Retrieve the history of proposals a given account has voted on

200.description: Array of proposals in which the given account has voted

get.description: Retrieve the leaderboard of voter accounts

200.description: Paginated response of the voter accounts, ordered by most voting weight to the least

get.description:
Returns market data for listed markets, optionally filterable by asset address.
Filtering by address will be deprecated and is not fully documented.

200.description: Returns Market data for all listed markets.

get.description: Return circulating supply by token

200.description: Return circulating supply by token

get.description: Return total supply by token

200.description: Return total supply by token

get.description: Returns market data for listed markets, optionally filterable by asset address.

200.description: Returns Market data for all listed markets.

get.description: Fetch an array of daily snapshots of supply and borrow totals and supply and borrow apy over the previous 365 days for a given asset.

200.description: Returns historical data for the requested asset.

get.description: Returns paginated array of proposals.

200.description: Returns an array of proposals.

get.description: Query voter accounts ordered by votes.

200.description: Returns an array of voter accounts ordered by votes

get.description: Get voter details for a given proposal.

200.description: Pagination object with paginated voter activity and a summary of proposal votes.

get.description: Returns paginated array of proposals. It takes an optional array of proposal ids to filter by.

200.description: Returns an array of proposals.

proposalIds.name: proposal_ids
proposalIds.description: Filter results with a comma separated proposal numbers

proposalId.name: id
proposalId.description: Proposal Id for fetching a detailed proposal

order.name: order
order.description: Set the order direction of results

orderV2.name: order
orderV2.description: Array of columns to order results. Default sort is descending. If '+' is prepended to a column it will be sorted ascending.
